code: import React from'react';import{call}from"../service/api-service";import SpeedDial from'@mui/material/SpeedDial';import SpeedDialIcon from'@mui/material/SpeedDialIcon';import SpeedDialAction from'@mui/material/SpeedDialAction';import SettingsIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Settings';import DownloadIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Download';import DeleteSweepIcon from'@mui/icons-material/DeleteSweep';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BasicSpeedDial(props){var icons=[{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsIcon,{}),name:'출력 내용 변경'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DownloadIcon,{}),name:'캐릭터 정보 업데이트'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteSweepIcon,{}),name:'중복 캐릭터 삭제'}];var actions=function actions(name){if(name==="출력 내용 변경"){window.location.href="setting";}if(name==="캐릭터 정보 업데이트"){props.setShowLinearProgress(true);call("/member/characterList","PATCH",null).then(function(response){props.setShowLinearProgress(false);props.showMessage("정보 업데이트가 완료되었습니다.");props.setCharacters(response);}).catch(function(error){props.setShowLinearProgress(false);alert(error.errorMessage);});}if(name==="중복 캐릭터 삭제"){props.setShowLinearProgress(true);call("/member/duplicate","DELETE",null).then(function(response){props.setShowLinearProgress(false);props.showMessage("중복된 캐릭터를 삭제하였습니다.");props.setCharacters(response);}).catch(function(error){props.setShowLinearProgress(false);props.showMessage(error.errorMessage);});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SpeedDial,{ariaLabel:"SpeedDial basic example",sx:{position:'fixed',bottom:30,right:30},icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SpeedDialIcon,{}),children:icons.map(function(icon){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SpeedDialAction,{icon:icon.icon,tooltipTitle:icon.name,onClick:function onClick(){return actions(icon.name);}},icon.name);})});}
